definitions.text: (military) military action or resources protecting a country against potential enemies
examples: they died in the defense of Stalingrad
they were developed for the defense program
sanitation is the best defense against disease

definitions.text: (sports) the team that is trying to prevent the other team from scoring
examples: his teams are always good on defense

definitions.text: the justification for some act or belief
examples: he offered a persuasive defense of the theory

definitions.text: (psychiatry) an unconscious process that tries to reduce the anxiety associated with instinctive desires
the federal department responsible for safeguarding national security of the United States; created in 1947
the defendant and his legal advisors collectively
examples: the defense called for a mistrial

definitions.text: the speech act of answering an attack on your assertions
examples: his refutation of the charges was short and persuasive
in defense he said the other man started it

definitions.text: an organization of defenders that provides resistance against attack
examples: he joined the defense against invasion

definitions.text: a structure used to defend against attack
examples: the artillery battered down the defenses

definitions.text: a defendant's answer or plea denying the truth of the charges against him
examples: he gave evidence for the defense

definitions.text: the act of defending someone or something against attack or injury
examples: a good boxer needs a good defense
defense against hurricanes is an urgent problem
